mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ${snatchurlTable} WHERE url = #{url} AND openDate = #{openDate}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ${snatchurlTable}( `url`, `title`, `snatchDatetime`, `snatchPlanId`, `type`, `status`, `openDate`, `range`, `edit`, `randomNum`, `biddingType`, `otherType`, `tableName`, `suuid`, `province`, `city`, `county`, `rank`, `redisId`, `websitePlanId`, `uuid`, `businessType`, `source`, `isShow` ) VALUES( #{url}, #{title}, NOW(), 2, #{type}, 1, DATE_FORMAT(#{openDate},'%Y-%m-%d'), YEAR(#{openDate}), #{edit}, 0, #{biddingType}, #{otherType}, #{tableName}, REPLACE(UUID(),'-',''), #{province}, #{city}, #{county}, #{rank}, #{redisId}, #{websitePlanId}, #{uuid}, #{businessType}, #{source}, #{isShow} )
mapper.select: SELECT s.id, s.url, s.openDate, s.title, cc.certificate, cc.certificateUuid, s.edit, d.pbMode, d.projDq, d.projXs, d.projType, d.tbEndDate, d.projSum, p.press, s.biddingType, d.bmSite, d.bmEndDate, s.otherType, s.province, s.city, s.county, s.type, s.tableName FROM mishu.snatchurl s LEFT JOIN mishu.zhaobiao_detail d ON s.id = d.snatchUrlId LEFT JOIN mishu.snatchpress p ON d.snatchUrlId = p.snatchUrlId LEFT JOIN (SELECT cert.contId as id, GROUP_CONCAT(cert.certificate) AS certificate, certificateUuid FROM mishu.snatch_url_cert cert WHERE cert.contId IN ( SELECT s1.id FROM mishu.snatchurl s1 LEFT JOIN mishu.zhaobiao_detail d ON s1.id = d.snatchUrlId LEFT JOIN mishu.snatchpress p ON d.snatchUrlId = p.snatchUrlId WHERE s1.type = 0 AND s1.isShow = 0 AND s1.openDate >= #{openDate} ) GROUP BY cert.contId) cc ON cc.id=s.id WHERE s.type = 0 AND s.isShow = 0 AND s.openDate >= #{openDate}

SELECT s.id, s.url, s.title, d.projDq, d.projType, d.pbMode, s.edit, d.projSum, p.press, s.openDate, d.projXs, d.oneName, s.province, s.city, s.county, s.type, s.tableName FROM mishu.snatchurl s LEFT JOIN mishu.zhongbiao_detail d ON s.id = d.snatchUrlId LEFT JOIN mishu.snatchpress p ON d.snatchUrlId = p.snatchUrlId WHERE s.type = 2 AND s.isShow = 0 AND s.openDate >= #{openDate}
